title: "AI-based Car Ownership Super App Jerry Secures $75 Million Series C Financing at $450 Million Valuation"
excerpt: "Car-ownership super app Jerry today announces the completion of a $75 million Series C funding round led by Goodwater Capital. The oversubscribed round values the company at $450 million. The financing was completed just seven months after Jerry's $28 million Series B round and brings total funding to $132 million."
